title-group.article-title: DIRECTIONAL CHEBYSHEV-TYPE METHODS FOR SOLVING EQUATIONS

abstract.p: A semi-local convergence analysis for directional Chebyshev-type methods in m-variables is presented in this study. Our convergence analysis uses recurrent relations and Newton–Kantorovich-type hypotheses. Numerical examples are also provided to show the effectiveness of the proposed method.
